name: Heart Surge
description:
Move around the scene with WASD and collect batteries for your dying wife. Be sure to avoid the cameras to not get caught! 

All credit for software used goes to Autodesk Maya, Adobe Substance Painter, FL Studio, and Unity Engine. Created by Bailey Hollis, Kaitlyn Carmona, Mateo Carlson, and Madeline Husby.  No starter projects or premade assets were used.
